start: Ahoy Sailor, what can I help you with?
We can talk about those shiny /gems, the mighty Sail'ore or the different /committees a pirate can join in between other things
What do you want to talk about?
predetermined: Oh me matey I didn't understand what you meant, but I know lots of other stories
Use /help to see everything we can talk about
spis: Spis are the pompiers of campus, whenever you have any problem you may call them
coach: The coaches are there to help you every time
The number of the coach in duty is 06 30 01 99 70

Then the other coaches: 
- Fernando: 06 61 65 30 53
- Eddy: 06 64 07 86 55
- Jeremy: 06 86 49 13 14
- Josselin: 06 19 27 00 83
doctor: The doctor in campus has number 01 69 33 39 06
Sometimes you can just show up but its better if you call before
help: There is lots of things to explore here, you can talk about those shiny /gems or the /lore
Moreover, I can also tell you about /spis, the /doctor, or any /coach
We can also talk about the important /groupchats or /committees and then you can access any of their sections
If you need to access polytechnique servers, set up your wifi and most things in between, use /services
And if you have trouble browsing through the different platforms that polytechnique uses, just use /academics
Finally if you spot any bug or have any ideas you can make a /request to our tech team
groupchats: In the bachelor we love telegram gcs and we have lots of them
BX All Promo (https://t.me/joinchat/cYz3yq0q_d00Mjc5) tries to unite all bachelor promotions and you should use it whenever you need something that older students can help you with
BX On Campus (https://t.me/+2vtM5hvKetEwNWI0) one of our latest additions that aims to reduce the useless conversations in AllPromo so as not to bother alumni
BX Announcements (https://t.me/+ze_2NPVrNcAzMDE0) is a channel for announcements that are directed for every bachelor
BX - MarketPlace (https://t.me/+fUs-Q23y04o5MWM0) is your go to gc whenever you want to sell/buy something from bachelors
Laundry Room Arguments 103 (https://t.me/+C7tU7hcHLUBjYzUx) is meant for discussions about laundry and mainly to notify when you change clothes from one machine to another
The Bâtiment Herald (https://t.me/bxmemes) is a meme channel
acadmics: There is lots of different platforms from École Polytechnique and learnign about all of them is really hard on the beginning
In Moodle (https://moodle.polytechnique.fr) you will find all of your classes and teachers will usually post assignments over here
Moreover, Synapses (https://synapses.polytechnique.fr) is where you will find your schedule and the registration for classes
Finally, Pegase (https://formulaires.polytechnique.fr/pegase/login/index.php) is used for more administrative and document related tasks
services: Use the following link to access some tech info and various services
